title: New Elemental Dragon Idea
body:
LIGHTNING DRAGON, it would have an aoe attack that spread lightning through the river, whilst it is active the scuttle crab's vision radius also deals damage over time to enemies that stand in it, like an electricity attack. 

The buff would be an on hit prock that deals damage on the first hit and spreads to other players, like chain lighting. Kinda like stattick shiv, and the same recharge with the 100 ms thingo.

replies.body:
I dont like the idea of having a second timed dragon. BUT I did vote "it's great" why? because it sparked another idea of some sort of map that changes or has variables about it that are different over time. Kill this monster/capture this point and your team heals in this area while the enemy is damaged for X time.... kill this monster/capture this point and your team is faster while the enemy team is slower...... capture this point and x thing  happens. 

A rotating game mode idea... that or something about a maze that is always changing, just sounds fun. /shrug
